title: The red-hot IPO Market , El Salvador’s Bitcoin Experiment and SCOTT IS BACK!
description:
Scott has returned! He and Kara talk about The Justice Department’s ad tech suit against Google, the SEC-Coinbase spat, a record year for IPOs, and El Salvador’s Bitcoin buy. And it wouldn’t be an episode with Scott without some predictions - he tells us which start-ups are about to get some major attention.

Send us your Listener Mail questions, via Yappa, at nymag.com/pivot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
